texts.description: I’m a web developer passionate about creating digital experiences.

home.title: Systems Engineering Student
home.slogan: Able to build, test, and lead with vision and commitment.
home.contactText: Available to collaborate on development, design, or project management.

myProjects.title: My Projects
myProjects.subtitle: A selection of my most outstanding projects

projects.title: AdaptEdu
projects.description: Personalized educational application based on learning styles.
projects.details: AdaptEdu is a web application that personalizes educational content according to users' learning styles. It uses artificial intelligence algorithms to adapt lessons, exercises, and assessments, improving material retention and comprehension.

projects.title: Ride Share Connect
projects.description: Web platform that connects clients with shared transport providers. Includes bookings, payments, and reviews.
projects.details: Ride Share Connect is a platform that facilitates shared transportation between users. It allows drivers to offer rides and passengers to book seats, manage payments, and rate experiences, promoting more sustainable mobility.

projects.title: Airline
projects.description: Web application for airline flight and booking management.
projects.details: Airline is a comprehensive system for airlines that manages flights, bookings, and user profiles. It includes features for online check-in, flight notifications, and loyalty program administration, improving the customer experience.

projects.title: Airline App (PM)
projects.description: Project focused on leadership and management for app development.
projects.details: Airline App is a project where project management and leadership skills were applied. It involved coordinating the development of an airline application, managing teams, defining requirements, and ensuring successful product delivery.

about.title: About Me
about.paragraph1: Systems Engineering student focused on full stack web development, project management, and software testing. I’m passionate about frontend development, creating dynamic interfaces with React, JavaScript, Next.js, HTML5, CSS3, SASS, Tailwind CSS, and design tools like Figma.
about.paragraph2: I have knowledge in MySQL, PostgreSQL, version control with Git/GitHub, and agile methodologies like Scrum, where I’ve learned to collaborate, manage sprints, and adapt efficiently to changes. Currently, I’m training in QA and manual testing to contribute to stable, user-centered products.

footer.thanks: Thank you for visiting my web portfolio.
